channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Goldman backs up our bank stock shuffle with strong earnings, upbeat M&A outlook
item.description: Shares popped roughly 6% to more than $600 apiece after a fourth-quarter revenue and earnings beat.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Settle at Two-Year High
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures rose 2.9% and posted their highest settle level since January 2023 ahead of a weekly storage report that’s expected to show t...

item.title: JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs Post Surging Profits
item.description: Big bank profits surged in the fourth quarter and Wall Street roared back to life, with net income rising 50% at JPMorgan Chase and more than doubling...

item.title: BlackRock delivers earnings beat that proves recent sellers of the stock wrong
item.description: New deals will help BlackRock obtain "higher and more durable organic growth," CEO Larry Fink said on the post-earnings call with investors.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase posts record profit as the bank’s massive scale pays off
item.description: The bank said profit rose 50% to $14 billion in the fourth quarter as noninterest expenses fell 7% from a year earlier.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Jump on Inflation Data, Bank Earnings
item.description: U.S. stocks recouped some of their recent losses, after new inflation data revived hopes of rate cuts, and solid results from big banks set a strong t...

item.title: A Good Year for Wall Street Isn't the Same as a Good Year for Banking
item.description: Even as trading and dealmaking surge, lending growth is muted.

item.title: Wells Fargo shares surge post-earnings as Wall Street wisely focuses on the big picture
item.description: While the reported numbers were solid, an upbeat outlook for 2025 stole the show.

item.title: Citigroup swings to fourth-quarter profit, tops estimates on investment banking strength
item.description: The fourth-quarter report comes after a year where Citi's stock rose almost 37%, outperforming the S&P 500.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Higher
item.description: Gold settled 1.3% higher and silver rose 3.9%, with both metals up for two consecutive sessions.
